transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Theek hai main abhi dekhta hu aapka. Hello
Customer: Haan sir. Sir aapka phone aapka phone cut gaya tha sir.
Executive: Are sir ji ek buyer ka phone hai customer ka phone hai usse baat ho rahi thi main kis kis ke phone rakhe. Haan ye
Customer: Achcha koi baat nahi. Maine aapka profile open kiya hu sir. Actually sir jo abhi aapne marble Shiv parivar statue ka jo aapne dala hai photos uski thodi si score down hai. Iski size kya hai sir aap bata sakte hain?
Executive: Marble Shiv Parvati?
Customer: Haan Shiv sir aapko main abhi nahi. Haan haan nahi abhi main system pe baithne do abhi main aapko call kar lunga.
Customer: Sir actually main open kiya hua hu sir aapne phone kiya tha na iske liye hi mujhe main to ye bol raha hu sir ji mere paas buyleads nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Sir usi ke liye main bol raha hu na ki main aapka jo catalog score hai na usko increase karke main dekh leta hu. Mujhe time to dijiyega sir. Paanch minute time dijiye na. Abhi ke kaam ke liye to main call kiya hu sir.
Executive: Haan to aap dekh lijiye.
Customer: Haan wahi main bol raha hu. Kyun nahi aa raha business kyun nahi aa raha buyleads kyun nahi aa rahi?
Executive: Sir main lead me bhi nahi dikhai de rahi. Meri baat suno. Past lead me bhi nahi dikhai de rahi buyleads. Main ye bol raha hu.
Customer: Main sara cheez main sara cheez dikhata hu. Main sara cheez dikha dunga sir aap tension mat lo. Hum sara cheez aapse discuss karenge. Aap time dijiye sir na sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Pehle to ye mujhe bataiye pehle ye mujhe bataiye ki marble Shiva parivar karke aapka ek product hai. Uski size kya hai 12 inch hai 24 inch hai 18 inch hai 36 inch hai?
Executive: Product dala hua hai kya ye?
Customer: Haan haan dala hua hai marble Shiva. 36 inch.
Executive: Kya Shiv Shiv Parvati hai ya Shiva hai?
Customer: Haan Shiva hai Shiva sir marble Shiva.
Executive: Statue? 18 inch ki.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Achcha 18 inch ki.
Executive: Theek hai. Ye single piece hai ya fir set of statue hai?
Executive: Aap photo dekh rahe hain to single hi hoga na joint thodi hai.
Customer: Okay. Aap aap se Shiva ka bhi single hoga.
Customer: Okay iske photos mujhe aap dijiyega ya fir Google se utha lu?
Executive: Main de dunga abhi aapko. Haan aap mere ko detail dal do. Photo photo main bhi de dunga aapko. Main system open karke main dekh lunga to meri samajh me aa jayegi ki kaun sa product aap dal rahe ho. Koi nahi nahi nahi koi baat nahi.
Customer: Sir koi baat nahi. Ek sir aapka black marble Srinath ji statue hai. Uska jo aapka ye Shri marble Srinath ji ye kaun sa god kaise Ganesh hai ya Radha Krishna hai ya Shiv parivar hai ya fir Hanuman hai ya Durga Ram Darbar ya Lakshmi Ganesh ya Sai Baba kya hai ye?
Executive: Kis me bhi dal do sir.
Customer: Kis me bhi dal do. Haan Lakshmi Ganesh me dal do.
Customer: Lakshmi Ganesh.
Executive: Theek hai. Achcha category me add kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Category me add kar rahe ho matlab.
Customer: Haan haan sir ji main sir aapne bola main. Size size kya rahega do ya iski size kya rahega ek feet ya do feet?
Executive: Upar chala na.
Customer: Sir iski size kya rahegi? Haan iski size kya rahegi sir? Haan
Executive: Sir size hai Srinath ji ki 18 inch. Haan haan sir 18 inch.
Customer: Aap mujhe sabka photo share kar dijiyega main bata diya hu. Theek hai. Aur inquiries ki baat karu. Haan haan photos aap dal dijiyega baki main photo dal dunga. Baki main inquiries ki baat karu.
Executive: Ye main dal dunga.
Customer: Ek second. La la la. Sahi hai? Haan hello. Main karta hu. Ek second karta hu call paanch minute me karta hu thoda. Theek theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Wants to update product details and categories.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to check and update product details.

- Executive asked for product size and details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product details, catalog, size
